entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
